title: Nitric acid
creator_credit: Sutherland Educational Films, Chem Study (Manufacturing Chemists Assoc Inc U S A) and Harry H Sisler
brief_description: With live action and animation applies fundamental principles to the descriptive chemistry of nitric acid. Demonstrates how nitric acid may act as an acid, as a base, and as an oxidising agent.
